text: Giacomo Blason (born 19 March 1914 in Fiumicello; died 3 February 1998 in Monfalcone) was an Italian professional football player and coach who played as a goalkeeper. ==Playing career== Blason played for 11 seasons (252 games) in the Serie A for U.S. Triestina Calcio, S.S. Lazio, S.S.C. Napoli and A.S. Roma. ==Managing career== As a coach, Blason managed SPAL in the Serie A in the 1963–64 season. ==External links== Category:1914 births Category:1998 deaths Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:U.S. Triestina Calcio 1918 players Category:S.S. Lazio players Category:S.S.C. Napoli players Category:A.S. title: Giacomo Blason
